block-definition.comment: substitute all occurrences of a letter or a sequence of letters in a text with another or none.

inputs.input: RedRed Green Blue Yellow Purple Cyan White Black

scripts.comment: use variable resistor to set gauge pointer
round() the result will be a floating number use round() to convert to integer if required
0 - 4095 0 - 180 analog input is 0 - 4095 use a formula to convert to 0 - 180
